Key Match Events: Gleyber Torres had a go-ahead, two-run single in the sixth inning in the night game
Torres started a game-ending double play with the bases loaded in the opener of a day-night doubleheader
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees entered 1-8 against the Red Sox this year and had not swept a doubleheader at Fenway Park since 2006
Others: Aaron Boone improved his managing record to 500-353 in six seasons
